title: Laborer, doorkeeper, future queen: Neurobiology in turtle ants reflects division of labor

title_detail.value: Laborer, doorkeeper, future queen: Neurobiology in turtle ants reflects division of labor

summary: The neurobiology of turtle ants differs significantly according to their specialized role within the colony, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: The neurobiology of turtle ants differs significantly according to their specialized role within the colony, according to a new study.
